solution_line_template: A whole pea patch is {one_sixth_pea_patch}*{fraction_denominator} = <<{one_sixth_pea_patch}*{fraction_denominator}={whole_pea_patch}>>{whole_pea_patch} square feet.
A radish patch is {whole_pea_patch}/{radish_ratio_divisor} = <<{whole_pea_patch}/{radish_ratio_divisor}={whole_radish_patch}>>{whole_radish_patch} square feet.
